WorkItem.Description:
So I succesfuly create an .xlsx workbook for download where the user enters data and later uploads it back for retrieval. Here's the issue with the download; everything's fine for both versions. However, after uploading:
 
Using office 2010, everything goes as planned, using office 2007,  I get the error :
 
Message: ZipArchive::getFromName() [ziparchive.getfromname]: Invalid
or unitialized Zip object
 
Filename: Reader/Excel2007.php
 
Line Number: 300
 
Zip is obviously enabled. Tried commenting the line 78 in Shared/File.php () as suggested in similar posts but futile. What could be the issue? Also not the anomally is inconsistent since I've tried on different machines office 2007 & worked...others didnt.
